response.original_title: ต่อคำรักถึงใจเธอ
response.overview: Paphai, a bumbling student council member on the verge of expulsion, is given a second chance by Khim, the student council president. His mission: to persuade Pae, a skilled crossword player who has been absent due to heartbreak, to return to school and participate in the competition. Paphai discovers that Pae's absence is rooted in emotional pain, and he embarks on a journey to rekindle Pae's motivation for racing. As these two young men, each feeling undervalued for different reasons—one by society's oversight, the other by the sting of lost love—come together, a unique bond forms. Their connection unfolds through the medium of a crossword, becoming a means of expressing their emotions and sparking an unexpected relationship.
response.title: Cause Word Meaning to Me

release_dates.note: พี่ครับ FILM Thesis Exhibition
